editor.frameRate8Hint: Very low frame rate, suitable for animation style or minimal file size
editor.frameRate12Hint: Low frame rate, suitable for simple animations or slideshows
editor.frameRate16Hint: Lower frame rate, suitable for animations or artistic effects
editor.frameRate20Hint: Medium-low frame rate, suitable for special artistic effects
editor.frameRate24Hint: Cinema standard frame rate, suitable for cinematic look
editor.frameRate25Hint: PAL standard frame rate, European TV standard
editor.frameRate30Hint: Standard frame rate, recommended for most scenarios
editor.frameRate50Hint: High frame rate, suitable for motion and slow motion
editor.frameRate60Hint: Ultra-high frame rate, suitable for gaming and high-speed motion
editor.videoQualityVeryLowHint: For quick preview, small file size but poor quality
editor.videoQualityLowHint: For web sharing, small file size with acceptable quality
editor.videoQualityMediumHint: Recommended, balanced file size and quality
editor.videoQualityHighHint: High quality, larger file size but clear picture
editor.videoQualityVeryHighHint: Highest quality, very large file size but best picture
